The purpose of this workflow is to analyze the results from 
cape_run_transcripts.Rmd

```{r setup}
plot.mod.net = FALSE
exp.name <- "top_three_PC"
geno.type = "modules"
exp.dir <- paste(geno.type, exp.name, sep = "_")
```

```{r load_code}

for(i in 1:length(all.fun)){source(all.fun[i])}
```
